```{r}
data(jtrain2)
```


```{r}
jtrain_table < - jtrain2 %>%
  group_by(train) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  mutate(prop = n() / sum(n), pct = prop*100) 

jtrain_table
```
